content: NYC's skyline has a new vibe after Japan. Planning a tech & philosophy meetup to fuse the calm of Mount Fuji with the city's hustle.
raw_content: "Back in NYC, the skyline feels different after Japan. The city's energy is a jolt, but there's a calm in my chaos now. Planning a tech & philosophy meetup - time to blend the tranquility of Mount Fuji with the hustle of NYC. #TechZen"
